name: Warm Chrismas Eve, But your boss called you.
name_original: Warm Chrismas Eve, But your boss called you.
description:
Move your character to company base on beat!

The purpose of the game is to get from point A to point B, the player's purpose is to avoid the crowds on the road and reach point B as soon as possible within a limited time. The game is based on beats. Every time a new beat comes, all the crowds will move. Players also need to press ASDW to move when the beat comes. Otherwise, the player will not move in this beat.

Players can see the crowd's move toward position for next beat, so players can make their own movement strategies base on this infomation. And, when the level getting higher, the Beat will much faster, which make the game faster and harder!
